articles.author: Alexander Howard
articles.title: The Government Is Learning How To Change Your Behavior -- Supposedly For Your Own Good
articles.description: Not every effort to change how we make choices will go flat like the soda ban that former Mayor Michael Bloomberg's administration tried to impose upon the people of New York City. The idea behind New York City's ban seemed simple enough: people will drink le…
articles.content:
Not every effort to change how we make choices will go flat like the soda ban that former Mayor Michael Bloomberg's administration tried to impose upon the people of New York City.
That effort, which ultimately fell apart after beverage companies sued the ci… [+5025 chars]
